transcript:
Customer: [music]
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good afternoon sir, main IndiaMART se Abdul baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Ji, sir aapne call kiya tha 9696 pe sir. A, services ke liye to just isliye maine call kiya tha.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART mein aapko...
Customer: Haan, maine na sir call kiya tha. Mujhe koi problem lag rahi hai sir mere pe IndiaMART pe. Aur na hi to golden leads vagera aa rahi hai. Vo kehte hain kuch apna partiya vagera kuch aa hi nahi rahi hain. Vahi dikhai de rahi hain sir 10-12 din se hi.
Executive: Kya, kya, sorry sir phir se bataiye sir.
Customer: Jo sir choldar partiya aati hain na.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: To sir vo aa hi nahi rahi. Vahi vaisi ka vaisi hai sab teen-char din se hi.
Executive: Nahi sir, by leads to aa rahi hai aapke paas. Aap dekhiye sir 13 hours ago dikh rahi hai, 18 hours ago dikh rahi hai sir. By leads to available hai. Kal ki date mein bhi ek by lead aayi hai jo aapke catalog views se hai sir.
Customer: Ji, ek minute rukna.

Executive: Kal ki tarikh mein hai?
Executive: Aap, aap keh rahe hain na teen-char din se by lead nahi aa rahi hai. To aap, aap do-teen din se bhi by lead dekh sakte hain.
Customer: Vo aisi aa rahi hain sir, ek-ek piece vali bas yahi hain jo bhi hain.
Executive: Nahi, ek-ek piece, right, ek-ek piece vali aap keh rahe hain vo mujhe bhi dikh raha hai yahan pe. Jaise agar aap dekhenge for example main aapko dikha raha hun.
Executive: Jaise agar aap dekhenge sir to aap
Executive: Right sir, main aapko bata deta hun. Aap isko on karte jaaiye. Dekhiye kal ki date mein bhi ek aapke paas inquiry aayi hai jo ki Delhi ki inquiry hai sir. Aur customer aapke, ye catalog views hai. In fact vo customer jo hai na aapke catalog pe aake check kiya hai. Ye inquiry hoti hai hot lead hoti hai. Dekhiye aapke paas hai na sir. Copling button, zipper and buckles. Isme deal karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Dekhiye yahan pe aapko Telangana ka hai order value jo hai 6,75,000 se leke 8,25,000 tak hai sir.
Customer: Hmm, Telangana ka Hyderabad ka hai?
Executive: Haan, aap ye dekhiye Raymond aapke paas printed silk hai. Isko chhod sakte hain ye aapka jo so retail ki by lead hai.
Customer: Raymond.
Executive: Haan, isko chhod dijiye ye aapka retail by lead hai. Baki aap dekh rahe hain.
Customer: Haryana ka Raymond ka ek piece hain?
Executive: Haan, usko chhod sakte hain. Vo ek piece aap usme deal, vo aapka retail ho jaega na sir. To retail to aap karte nahi hain.
Executive: Haan na, to aur bhi inquiry aapke dekho per day basis pe aapko do se teen hi by leads purchase karni hain. To yahan pe do se teen by lead aapko purchase karna hai. Dekhiye ek aur aapke paas by lead dikh raha hoga blue tie pocket square set box.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ye Delhi ka hai recent mein aayi hai. Recent mein aayi hai.

Customer: Blue tie. Kahan ki hai?
Executive: A, nahi nahi, blue tie, haan blue tie pocket square set box Delhi ka hai sir.
Customer: Delhi ka?

Hmm.
Customer: Delhi ka. Thik hai.
Executive: Haan, to isko aap purchase kar sakte hain. To in sab inquiry ko aap purchase kariye. Dekhiye sir aapko do-do, teen-teen by leads milti hai. Aap do-do, teen-teen by leads. To ye to sir ispe na...
Customer: Nahi sir, ye to baat sahi hai. Blue tie pocket square set box hai. Yahi vali bol rahe ho na?
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Ji, ye jo photo laga hua hai na, ye tie ka ye mera hi ye vaise to sir jo product ka jo photo laga hua hai ye mera hi hai lekin ye ek din pehle lagi hui hai.
Executive: Vahi to, to inquiry to aa rahi hai na. Aapne bola teen-char din se nahi aa rahi. Aap koi bhi nahi ek din pehle ka to aap check kar lijiye ek baar. Ye aapke profile pe aake hi sir isne by lead raise kiya hai. Yani aapke profile pe aaya tha ye.
Customer: Vaise to sahi aa rahi hai ji ab to ek-ek hi piece ki aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Nahi to aapko sirf do by lead pehle purchase karna hai. Aap ye do kijiye. Sir kal aapke paas dekho sir har din do-do karenge na to aapke paas increase hota rahega. Dikhega 50-60 but usme jo aapke relevant hai jiska order value aapke relevant hai usko aap purchase kar lijiye. Aapko do hi teen to purchase karna hai per day basis pe.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Baki ye to aana hai sir aapki. Hmm, haan.
Executive: Baki aap customer ke. Haan boliye. Ji, ji. Ji, ji bataiye, bataiye.
Executive: Haan, main ye keh raha tha ki ye number save kar lijiye. Mera naam Abdul hai. Maine aapko last time bhi aapse baat ki hui hai kaafi time. Main pilom ka manager hun. To aap bhi na sir customer ke call karne se pehle aap hume connect kijiye. Hum aapko same guide karenge sir. Thik hai. To ye number save kar lijiye future mein kabhi. Guide karte the na. Vo jo mujhe guide karte the unki call hi nahi lag rahi.
Executive: Haan, Aditya vo abhi available nahi hai system mein. A, to aap mujhe connect kijiye. Main unka manager hun. Aur aap is number pe call kijiye. Jo bhi aapko problem ya koi bhi aapko issue face kar rahe hain IndiaMART se aap direct mujhse connect kar sakte hain. Hmm. Thik hai sir. Main aapko definitely isko guide kar dunga.
Executive: Thik hai. Baki ye concern aapka ye jo hai isko main close kar dun sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Aapke paas jo hai na feedback ke liye call jaega, ek mail jaega sir jo bhi maine aapko feedback diya hai. A, uske regarding aapke paas mail jaegi. Aap sir jo bhi aapne pucha maine uska solution provide kar diya sir. To usse aap sir feedback dijiyega. Thik hai sir. Achha sir, Izhar sir ek baat just aapse just ye puchna tha ki aapne jo services le rakhi hai sir IndiaMART mein. Ye aapka jo hai na basic package hai. Matlab NBC package aapne liya hua hai. Isko aap
Executive: Upgrade kar lijiye hamare higher package mein sir TrustSeal mein aapko best offer bhi mil jaega. Aapki jo listing hai vo bhi up ho jaegi. Usme double aapko inquiry diya jaega sir.
Customer: Kya karna hai sir mujhe?
Executive: Main keh raha hun isko upgrade kar lijiye hamare higher package mein TrustSeal package mein sir.
Customer: Higher karna hai?
Executive: A, haan higher package mein upgrade kar lijiye. Yani ki abhi aapne NBC le rahe, liya hua hai na sir. To isko TrustSeal mein upgrade kar lijiye. TrustSeal kya hota hai ki abhi jo listing hai na usse up aapki listing dikhegi ye IndiaMART ki. Plus 34 by lead rahega aur aapki listing bhi jyada rahegi. To usme kya almost aapko double sab kuch milega sir. Inquiry bhi jyada aapke paas aaegi. Aapki listing bhi up dikhegi. To jisse kya hoga ki abhi jo problem aap, aapke paas jo by lead hai na 34 by lead rahega. To aap samajh sakte hain jab listing up hogi to inquiry bhi jyada rahega sir. Aur usme kya hai na ek certificate bhi hum provide karaenge TrustSeal ka. IndiaMART TrustSeal ka ek certificate bhi rahega. Jisse aur jyada aapko benefit milega sir.
Customer: Chaliye main uske bare mein discuss karne ke baad bataunga ye.
Executive: Haan, discuss kijiye sir jyada better rahega sir. Aapne ye package chalaya aap isse aage vale package pe jaaiye usme aur jyada inquiry milegi. Thik hai. To ye number save kar lijiye aap humse connect kar sakte hain. Save kar liya sir aapka number ye to.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai na. Baki main concern close kar raha hun sir. Aur koi doubt to nahi hai sir? Aur koi issue to nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi aur koi doubt hoga to main aapse baat kar lunga phir sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir, done. Isi number pe call kijiye ga sir. Thik hai. Ji, ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving golden leads and parties.

- Only receiving leads for single pieces.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed buyleads are available.

- Advised to purchase relevant leads.

- Suggested upgrading to TrustSeal package.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss upgrade later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, upgrade, trustseal
